product_name: Living ProofNo Frizz Smooth Styling Cream For Medium Hair
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackLiving Proof No Frizz Smooth Styling Cream is a silicone-free styling cream for medium hair types that controls frizz, conditions from root to tip, and leaves hair with long-lasting smoothness, shine, softness, and manageability.
details: DetailsBenefitsReduces frizz by 75% and leaves hair 6x smoother after one use*Provides smoothness and frizz control that lasts for 96 hours*Conditions from root to tip, enhancing shine, softness + manageabilityBlocks humidity to prevent frizzHeat protection up to 450°F/232°CSpecifically formulated for medium hair*When using the No Frizz System (No Frizz Shampoo, Conditioner + Styler) vs. untreated.Key IngredientsProprietary Smoothing Technology: Proprietary technology that repels humidity to prevent frizz while also smoothing and aligning hair fibers.Shea butter: Nourishes, conditions, and smooths hair fibers.Emollient blend: Enhances shine and adds slip.Fiber conditioning base: Softens and conditions hair to boost manageability.Item 2604509How To UseApply to clean, damp hair from roots to end. Comb through. Blow-dry for a smooth style. Medium, thick, and coarse hair types can double down on their smoothing efforts by applying No Frizz Smooth Styling Cream for extra conditioning to damp hair first and then follow with No Frizz Smooth Styling Serum.  If your hair tends to get tangled, use No Frizz Smooth Styling Spray to help detangle your hair and then follow with No Frizz Smooth Styling Cream by applying mid-lengths to ends.IngredientsWater/Eau/Aqua, Cetyl Alcohol, Polycitronellol t-butyl ether, Isopentyldiol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Isoamyl Laurate, C10-18 Triglycerides, Isodecyl Oleate, Glycol Stearate, Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root Extract, Diheptyl Succinate, Glyceryl Ricinoleate, Linoleamidopropyl Dimethylamine Dimer Dilinoleate, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Propanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Ethyl Lauroyl Arginate HCl, Hydroxyacetophenone, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Fragrance/Parfum, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Citronellol, CitronellolShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to clean, damp hair from roots to end. Comb through. Blow-dry for a smooth style. Medium, thick, and coarse hair types can double down on their smoothing efforts by applying No Frizz Smooth Styling Cream for extra conditioning to damp hair first and then follow with No Frizz Smooth Styling Serum.  If your hair tends to get tangled, use No Frizz Smooth Styling Spray to help detangle your hair and then follow with No Frizz Smooth Styling Cream by applying mid-lengths to ends.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: Offer free shipping on orders over $35.  i was about to place an order for $46 and found $6.95 shipping automatically added in.  No sale here as I don't do business with fraud

reviews.headline: I'm still frizzy.
reviews.comments:
This only worked for me when the humidity was below 80% so this won't do anything for me in the summertime. 
It's also some what pricey considering how long the bottle lasts. (I have medium length hair)

reviews.headline: didn't help with frizz
reviews.comments: I didn't notice any difference, i got the same frizzy hair as I had without it.

reviews.headline: didn't help frizz
reviews.comments: I have super frizzy hair and it didn't really tame it especially from air drying.

reviews.headline: didn't help frizz
reviews.comments: I have super frizzy hair and it didn't really tame it especially from air drying.

reviews.headline: My fav hair product
reviews.comments: My favorite hair product! I initially received this in a subscription box years ago and ive bought it as soon as it runs out. I can definitely tell when i don't put it in my hair… it definitely helps with maintaining frizz in all types of weather. Love love love it!

reviews.headline: Holy grail product
reviews.comments:
I have very frizzy, very poofy, tight curly hair— think jennifer beal in flash dance type hair. I honestly should have been born in the 80s!!! 

Anyway, this is my holy grail product. I have never had a product leave my hair so silky and smooth. I usually straighten my hair but this product is so good i can even rock my curls now

Curly haired girls… get this ! Worth the cost

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Too greasy and my hair felt heavier

reviews.headline: Natural curly haired
reviews.comments: Does not smooth and leaves my hair looking dull.

reviews.headline: A must buy1
reviews.comments: My hair is 80% gray, and I color it every three weeks.  My hair is extremely coarse, frizzy, and dry.  This, along with the shampoo and conditioner, have made a tremendous difference in the look and feel of my hair.

reviews.headline: It Works, It Really Works!
reviews.comments: I was telling my Ulta colorist that  the main issue with my hair is occasional frizzies on top. She suggested this Living Proof product. The only product I have had from this brand was the shampoo, which I didn't care for.  I took a chance and bought the small size of this cream.. After washing/conditioning my hair, I applied it. It worked wonderfully and gave me nice curls. Also has no heavy fragrance as other brands do. It feels light and weightless.

reviews.headline: Effective.
reviews.comments: This was recommended for my hair at the Ulta store. My hair is straight and somewhat thin and fine. I can use this year round here in South Carolina. It's pretty effective and not too heavy for my hair.

reviews.headline: 100% worth it
reviews.comments: I recently went on a trip and was washing my hair with hard water and used this when I got back because my hair felt dead and disgusting. after using my hair felt and looked so much better!! I will definitely be using again and prefer it over many other leave in conditioners/ hair masks.

reviews.headline: Love this styling cream
reviews.comments: I have very dry hair and this cream makes it smooth .

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: I used this product along with the no frizz smooth styling serum and they work great together. My hair was glossy and frizz free after a blow dry and flat iron. The only downfall is this cream is a little too greasy. I have thick curly hair, so I put a decent amount on but I've learned that less is more with this product. I will try using a little less next time and see how it turns out. Overall, I would definitely reccomend.

reviews.headline: Bring back the old formula
reviews.comments: My old bottle ran out and the new formula I just cant get the hang of. I'm either frizzy or greasy. I can't imagine what my hair would look like in the summer with this product.

reviews.headline: Great lightweight styling cream
reviews.comments: Smells amazing, lightweight, tames frizz, easy to apply and rinse off, not greasy. I live in florida and have wavy & curly hair - doing great so far!

reviews.headline: No More
reviews.comments: I bought this over the summer to try when my stash of the old formula ran out. I am beyond disappointed. This new formula is like lotion for the hair. It is no longer like a classy gel (the old formula would hold my hair back all day without flyaways, like a gel without the residue of a gel, and would leave my hair soft and "nourish[ed]" like the old version name "nourishing" when I would let my hair down after work). This new version is a flop and leaves my hair feeling and looking greasy. It does nothing to "smooth" it out. It no longer holds it back. I wish I would have tried it sooner so that I could have returned it. Living Proof, why mess with a good thing? Please bring back the old formula. That was my friend in the morning to keep my hair calm, and it gave me confidence at work. Please bring back my friend.

reviews.headline: Good product for wavy hair
reviews.comments: I tried this styling cream for my wavy, frizzy, coarse hair after trying many others. I use a blow dryer and at times a curling iron. It made my hair softer and more manageable without weighing it down. It's pricey but I don't wash my hair every day.

reviews.headline: Love this Product!
reviews.comments: Brings back life to my hair that the sun/heat has taken away.

media.headline: Great addition to my No Frizz Routine!
Eliminates frizz and makes styling so much easier

faceoff_positive.comments:
An absolute necessity and holy grail product for me. I have long used the smooth styling cream, and it has been transformative for my hair. I never want to be without this product, and so I was thrilled when this favorite product was gifted by Living Proof. The results for me— smooth, shiny, frizz free hair that is manageable and looks great! I have long, thick, naturally curly hair that I straighten. Most products do not properly support a great blowout for me— they're too heavy, greasy, or just make my hair curl up again. The Living Proof Smooth Styling Cream is amazing. Lightweight, nourishing, and my secret for the perfect and easy blowout. 

I add a small amount to damp, combed through hair, and then I add a bit more to each section before heat drying. I focus on ends to roots, using less near the top. Surprisingly, only a small amount is needed, even for my long, thick hair. My hair dries easier, smoother, and it is frizz free. This cream blocks humidity and it has a built-in heat protectant, so I can feel better about heat styling. As with other Living Proof products, this cream is actually good for your overall hair health— it's free of silicones, parabens, sulfates, etc. I can honestly say that my hair has been transformed since I started using Living Proof products a few years back, especially this one. It is pricey, but it lasts a while and it works wonders!!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing product— a holy grail for smooth, frizz free hair

faceoff_negative.comments: I bought this over the summer to try when my stash of the old formula ran out. I am beyond disappointed. This new formula is like lotion for the hair. It is no longer like a classy gel (the old formula would hold my hair back all day without flyaways, like a gel without the residue of a gel, and would leave my hair soft and "nourish[ed]" like the old version name "nourishing" when I would let my hair down after work). This new version is a flop and leaves my hair feeling and looking greasy. It does nothing to "smooth" it out. It no longer holds it back. I wish I would have tried it sooner so that I could have returned it. Living Proof, why mess with a good thing? Please bring back the old formula. That was my friend in the morning to keep my hair calm, and it gave me confidence at work. Please bring back my friend.
faceoff_negative.headline: No More
